Simulate stratified binary outcomes

sim.binary.Rd

Internal function to simulate stratified binary data (logistic or probit) with random intercepts and no prevalence calibration.

Usage

sim.binary(
  n_stratum,
  beta,
  stratum.size.mean = 80,
  rho = 0.8,
  link = c("logit", "probit"),
  stratum_sd = 0.5,
  seed = NULL
)

Arguments

n_stratum

Number of strata.

beta

Numeric vector of coefficients (length p).

stratum.size.mean

Mean stratum size (Poisson distributed).

rho

Correlation parameter for Z within stratum.

link

Link function, one of "logit" or "probit".

stratum_sd

Standard deviation of stratum random intercepts.

seed

Optional RNG seed.

Value

A list with combined data frame, data list, and metadata.
